reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and versatile, noting it can be dressed up or down. The material receives positive feedback for its softness and perfect thickness, with one customer mentioning it's particularly suitable for cooler days. They appreciate the fit, with one noting it's long enough for a classy mature look.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: This women’s long maxi dress is absolutely stunning. The material is soft, lightweight, and really comfortable, making it perfect for everyday wear or dressing up for a special occasion. It drapes beautifully and moves nicely without feeling clingy. The fit is flattering and true to size, with just the right amount of stretch. It gives that effortless, elegant look while still being super easy to wear. The length is perfect too—long and flowy without dragging on the ground. The quality is fantastic for the price, with neat stitching and a design that looks even better in person. Whether you wear it casually with sandals or dress it up with accessories, it’s versatile and stylish. Overall, this maxi dress is comfortable, pretty, and great value—a perfect addition to any wardrobe! Read more
items.author: ashkasshh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The quality, fit & style met all my expectations!
items.body: This blk well made dress is just so nice ! Feels like a heavy tee shirt, no wrinkles, once you slide it on it fits like a glove and slims you right down. Im wearing it to a very fancy wedding with blk boots, adding a beautiful beaded necklace & bracelet with lots of color. This dress is exactly what I had hoped it would be. Im 73 yrs young and this absolutely fits my style. I did order a x large first thinking it would run small, it was huge and just too much, I will be sending it back. Reordered in a size large and its perfect in every way. I will dress it up for the upcoming wedding, and dress down for dinner out with sandals. Im 5'4 150 lbs. The price & quality of this dress more than passed my expectations. I will order in the Army green as well. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Soft and So Many Compliments!
items.body: Material is thicker with a lining similar, but lighter, than fleece. You can’t tell the inside is fleece because the outer material is “flat”. Super soft and breathable!! This dress received several compliments when I wore it with riding boots and a jean jacket. REAL pockets are a huge perk. I am 5’2”, 115lbs and ordered a medium. Sizing was perfect and the length hit me at my ankles. My ONLY thing with this dress is that there is a slit on each side, not just one. More of a personal adjustment than a problem, though! Read more
items.author: Autumn Richardson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the money
items.body: I really like this dress. It is true to size and very stretchy. The quality is good and the pockets don’t make it look bulky on the hips. The only thing I would say is a downfall is the slit is a little higher if you have long legs. I’m 5’9 and I definitely have to watch what I do. Read more
items.author: Kayla M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great casual dress that can be "dressed up" with a scarf.
items.body: This has become a "go-to" casual dress for me. Fits well and is so comfortable. Fabric is so nice for cooler days (not bulky and hot). I ordered another one in black. Read more
items.author: lynne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress this dress up or down - Perfect!
items.body: Great fabric, great fit! I love the quality and look of every dress dive purchased from this company. Fun to change it up from the maxi look to their shorter versions of carefree styles. Thank you! Read more
items.author: Donna

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice dressy dress.
items.body: I got the red one. If I were more svelte, it would be quite lovely. I’m 5’5” and 135 lbs and got the size medium. It’s quite pretty accessorized with a large scarf or necklace. Good value for money. Light weight fabric. Nice pockets. Read more
items.author: Carolyn B. Andres

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile, Comfortable and Soft
items.body: So many compliments on the dress! It’s comfy and perfect for my baby bump! I can still wear it after I have my little. The material is soft and it fits loose but still fitted enough to show my bump. It’s so comfortable. I bought 3 and I got my mom 4 of them. I dressed it up for a christening today and plan on wearing it casually as well. My mom wears them as house dresses. Versatile. Great purchase! I am 5’4 and 8 months pregnant and got a large. My mom is 5’0 and got smalls. Read more
items.author: Kristi Clark

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Forest Green, Deep Green, Purple Red, Army Green, Hot Pink, Black, Navy Blue, Light Blue, Red, Lake Blue, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
